column4: hi guys - i'm really short on HD space (this is an ancient laptop) and i ran out of it in todays kernel upgrade, had to apt-get clean to be able to even start the system
what else can I do to clear as many megabytes as possible, like apt-get clean?
any Temporary folder, something like that?
or if you prefer a GUI, go to Applications>Accessories>Disk Usage Somethingorother
